Light Darts.usage: When Holtzman shields were introduced the use of lasguns became too dangerous and subsequently, the use of dart projectiles became the standard ammunition of House Troops and other military forces.

Melange Spiced Food.usage: Spiced food, raises spice in blood

Melange Spiced Liquor.usage: Spiced drink, raises spice in blood

Melange Spiced Wine.usage: Spiced drink, raises spice in blood

Scout Ornithopter Wing Mk4.crafting_materials: 9x Aluminum Ingot, 4x Advanced Servoks, 3x Cobalt Paste, 2x Industrial Pump, 340x Water

Scout Ornithopter Wing Mk5.crafting_materials: 12x Duraluminum Ingot, 7x Advanced Servoks, 6x Cobalt Paste, 3x Industrial Pump, 340x Water

Scout Ornithopter Wing Mk6.crafting_materials: 15x Plastanium Ingot, 10x Advanced Servoks, 9x Cobalt Paste, 4x Fluid Efficient Industrial Pump, 340x Water

Shaitan’s Tongue.unique_effect: Higher clip size and increased damage

Shelters (T1).usage: Basic survival structure for protection from storms and heat.

Shigawire Claw.how_to_obtain: Purchased from a Fremen vendor or looted in caves
Shigawire Claw.usage: A utility gadget for vertical traversal of cliffs or canyon walls, Trooper launcher for traversal or combat

Silicone Block.usage: Refined from flour sand, used in crafting

Sinkcharts.usage: Unlock recipes, found in Deep Desert

Spice.usage: Consumed for abilities, found in spice fields

Spice Infusion.how_to_obtain: Unlocked via the Mentat perk path and crafted with refined spice
Spice Infusion.usage: Temporarily boosts stamina regeneration and reaction time

Spice Sampler.usage: Used to collect spice samples for refining

Spice-infused Aluminum Dust.usage: Used in vehicle crafting, plastanium tier

Spice-infused Duraluminum Dust.usage: Used in vehicle crafting, plastanium tier

Spice-infused Iron Dust.usage: Used in vehicle crafting, plastanium tier

Spice-infused Plastanium Dust.usage: Used in vehicle crafting, plastanium tier

Spice-infused Steel Dust.usage: Used in vehicle crafting, plastanium tier

Standard Dirk.crafting_materials: 60x Water, 4x Iron Ingot, 14x Plasteel Microflora Fiber, 3x Plant Fiber, 9x Blade Parts

Standard Disruptor M11.crafting_materials: 8x Iron Ingot, 4x Silicone Block, 5x Mechanical Parts, 7x Gun Parts
Standard Disruptor M11.usage: Standard sidearm, fires darts to penetrate Holtzman Shields

Standard Drillshot FK7.crafting_materials: 70x Water, 30x Iron Ingot, 11x Mechanical Parts, 25x Silicone Block, 29x Gun Parts, 5x Heavy Caliber Compressor

Standard GRDA 44.crafting_materials: 70x Water, 30x Iron Ingot, 11x Mechanical Parts, 25x Silicone Block, 29x Gun Parts, 5x Heavy Caliber Compressor

Standard JABAL Spitdart.crafting_materials: 70x Water, 9x Iron Ingot, 8x Mechanical Parts, 7x Silicone Block, 11x Gun Parts

Standard K-28 Lasgun.crafting_materials: 70x Water, 30x Iron Ingot, 11x Mechanical Parts, 25x Silicone Block, 29x Gun Parts, 5x Heavy Caliber Compressor, 5x Holtzman Amplifier

Standard Karpov 38 (Weapons).crafting_materials: 70x Water, 9x Iron Ingot, 8x Mechanical Parts, 7x Silicone Block, 11x Gun Parts

Standard Kindjal.crafting_materials: 60x Water, 4x Iron Ingot, 14x Plasteel Microflora Fiber, 3x Plant Fiber, 9x Blade Parts

Standard Maula Pistol.crafting_materials: 5x Iron Ingot, 3x Silicone Block, 7x Mechanical Parts, 7x Gun Parts
Standard Maula Pistol.usage: Standard lightweight sidearm with short range

Standard Rafiq Snubnose.crafting_materials: 70x Water, 8x Iron Ingot, 15x Mechanical Parts, 5x Silicone Block, 11x Gun Parts

Standard Rapier.crafting_materials: 60x Water, 4x Iron Ingot, 14x Plasteel Microflora Fiber, 3x Plant Fiber, 9x Blade Parts

Standard Sword (Weapons).crafting_materials: 60x Water, 4x Iron Ingot, 14x Plasteel Microflora Fiber, 3x Plant Fiber, 9x Blade Parts

Standard Vulcan GAU-92.crafting_materials: 70x Water, 30x Iron Ingot, 11x Mechanical Parts, 25x Silicone Block, 29x Gun Parts, 5x Heavy Caliber Compressor

Steel Ingot.how_to_obtain: Refined from Iron Ingot and Carbon
Steel Ingot.usage: Refined from iron and carbon, used in products

Stillsuits.how_to_obtain: Crafted, acquired early via tutorial quest; can be upgraded
Stillsuits.usage: Crafted for desert survival, extracts water, captures and recycles body moisture, reducing water consumption while exploring

Stilltent.usage: Equip to deploy a temporary shelter, regain moisture

Stravidium.usage: Controlled in PVP, found in Deep Desert

Survival Station.usage: Entry-level bench for consumables and basic survival gear (e.g., Water Flasks).

Terrarium of Muad’Dib.usage: Detailed decoration housing a desert mouse, Muad’Dib, depicting its life

Titanium.usage: Controlled in PVP, found in Deep Desert

Tri-Forged Hydraulic Piston.usage: Used in vehicle crafting, plastanium tier

Upgraded Regis Spice Container.crafting_materials: 75x Plastanium Ingot, 30x Advanced Servoks, 35x Cobalt Paste, 50x Plasteel Composite Armor Plating, 15x Diamondine Dust, 1000x Water
Upgraded Regis Spice Container.usage: Upgraded storage for Sandcrawler, increased capacity for spice

Vehicle Fabricator.crafting_materials: 150x Steel Ingot, 60x Mechanical Parts, 40x Polymers, 8x Hydraulic Piston
Vehicle Fabricator.usage: Fabricates vehicle parts and modules for Sandbikes, Buggies, Ornithopters, and Sandcrawlers.

Vehicles.research_required: Intel or schematic for vehicles category

Walker Sandcrawler Engine Mk6.crafting_materials: 60x Plastanium Ingot, 35x Cobalt Paste, 20x Particle Capacitor, 30x Complex Machinery, 10x Tri-Forged Hydraulic Piston, 900x Water
Walker Sandcrawler Engine Mk6.usage: Walker engine for Sandcrawler, lower acceleration but higher top speed

Water Cisterns.crafting_materials: 80x Steel Ingot, 24x Watertube, 18x Mechanical Parts, 30x Polymers

Water Cisterns (T1).crafting_materials: 80x Steel Ingot, 24x Watertube, 18x Mechanical Parts, 30x Polymers
Water Cisterns (T1).usage: Automates storage of water from Windtraps and other inputs; prevents overflow.

Water Flask.how_to_obtain: Crafted at a survival station or bought from neutral outposts
Water Flask.usage: Replenishes the hydration meter and prevents dehydration debuffs

Welding Wire.usage: Welding material is required when using the welding torch to repair vehicle parts. Crafted from salvaged metal parts.

Windtrap.impact_on_progression: Essential for water generation in bases
Windtrap.how_to_obtain: Built at a base using harvested alloys and polymers
Windtrap.usage: Generates water over time when placed in a base or settlement area

Personal Light.description: A Personal Light for exploration. Toggle on/off.
Personal Light.function: Portable light source; equips to gadget slot

Abulurd’s Rapture.how_to_obtain: Schematic from Imperial Testing Station No. 142 (large chest, respawns ~45m) or Exchange

Construction Tool.description: Solido Construction Projector. Used to build, move, repair, or demolish structures; only on claimed land (Sub-fief).

Vehicle Backup Tool.usage: Store one vehicle (Sandbike or Scout Ornithopter) as an item in inventory; protects from sandworms/PvP while stored.
Vehicle Backup Tool.notes: Does not store Buggy. One vehicle per VBT. Useful to move buggy parts via disassembly workaround.

Welding Torch Mk1.usage: Repair, assemble, detach vehicle parts; requires Welding Wire for repair; low repair quality.

Fabricator.function: Produces complex items (gear, tools, weapons up to Iron tier)

Weapons Fabricator.function: Produces weapons and ammo, up to advanced tiers

Spice Refinery.function: Refines raw spice into Spice Melange

Blood Purifier.notes: Unlock via 'Water from Blood' questline; requires power to operate.

Fuel Generator.function: Provides base power using fuel cells

Sub-Fief Console.function: Claims land, allows building and expansion

Advanced Sub-Fief Console.function: Expands base build radius; advanced sub-fief management

Basic Stillsuit.function: Entry-level stillsuit for surviving Arrakis heat and dehydration

Advanced Stillsuit Mk2.function: Provides superior water conservation and moderate protection

Light Armor Set.function: Light protective armor granting mobility and modest defense

Heavy Armor Set.function: Strong protection at the cost of agility

Water Purifier.function: Purifies dirty water or blood-derived liquids into drinkable water

Recycler.function: Disassembles items, returning a portion of component materials based on condition.

Medium Armor Set.function: Balanced armor between light and heavy

Spice Purifier.function: Purifies raw spice into refined spice melange consumables

Sardaukar Armor Set.function: Elite imperial armor with strong protection and water conservation

Fremen Stillsuit Mk6.function: Legendary stillsuit of the Fremen, maximizing water retention

Advanced Ore Refinery.function: Processes larger quantities of ores into ingots faster

Large Chemical Refinery.function: Processes large chemical loads into advanced products

Massive Storage Container.function: Ultimate storage container for major bases

Spice Refinery (Small).function: Refines Spice Sand into Spice Melange and Spice Residue

Medium Ore Refinery.function: Refines ores into ingots at higher throughput.

Large Ore Refinery.function: High-end refinery producing ingots from raw ores with improved efficiency vs smaller refineries.

Small Chemical Refinery.function: Processes raw resources into Cobalt Paste, Silicone Blocks, and Fuel Cell Packs.

Medium Chemical Refinery.function: Processes larger chemical loads; used for Silicone Blocks, Cobalt Paste, Lubricant, Vehicle Fuel Cells.

Water Cistern.function: Stores water used by base production units; can be drunk from.

tips_verified: Filters in Windtraps directly control uptime; always carry higher-tier filters.
Vehicle Backup Tools only store one vehicle; own multiples to manage multiple crafts.
Armor sets grant specific bonuses: light = mobility, medium = balance, heavy = max defense.
Wind Turbines require lubricant from Chemical Refineries.
Advanced Sub-Fief Console extends building radius.
